```{r automatically collect links}

files <- list.files(path=".", pattern="*.Rmd")

for(i in 1:length(files)){
  
  script <- readLines(files[i])
  
  urls <- gsub('^.|.$', '', gsub('^.|.$', '', stringr::str_match(script,"\\]\\(.*?\\) ")))
  
}


```
